onboarding.about: This is the global activity feed. It's populated by recent activity from all of Kitsu's users - even you! Once you've had a chance to follow a few more interesting users, we'll switch your default feed from Global to Following.

group-invite.revoked: Your invitation has been revoked by a group moderator.
group-invite.subtitle: You have been invited to {group} by {sender}
group-invite.text: You'll be able to access {group}'s page after accepting this invite. We'll redirect you after accepting.

activity.feed-restricted: This is a restricted group. Anyone can comment, only leaders can create posts.

errors.neighbors-same: You can't add your group as a neighbor.

about.desc: Explain your group's purpose in depth, share important information, or anything else.

avatar.desc: This image will be used throughout Kitsu to identify your group.

category.desc: Kitsu uses categories to organize groups to help users find more of what they love.

cover.desc: This image will appear at the top of your group's page on desktops. Sides may be cropped slightly based on the viewer's screen size.

name.desc: Group names should clearly communicate what your group is about, but you can still be creative and have fun with it!

neighbors.desc: Add related groups to your Neighborhood so your members can discover new communities!

privacy.desc: Your privacy settings determine how open or closed your group is to the public. If you choose to make your group private, you will NOT be able to make it public in the future.

rules.desc: Set out some guidelines for your group members to follow. These rules are Markdown supported!

tagline.desc: Summarize the purpose of your group in 60 characters or less. You'll have room to add more information later.

onboarding.about: As you continue to use Kitsu your ''Personal Feed'' below will begin to populate with the anime and manga you've watched, read, completed, and plan to check out. You can also post text, images, and videos to your feed using the form below. Your posts will be seen and appreciated by your followers and users from the global feed.
